title.rendered: New SEC Cybersecurity Requirements for Investment Advisers in 2023

content.rendered:
New SEC Cybersecurity Requirements for Investment Advisers 

 
In today’s ever-evolving digital landscape, cybersecurity has become a paramount concern for investment advisers. With the increased frequency and sophistication of cyber threats, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has recognized the need for enhanced cybersecurity measures to protect sensitive client information and maintain the integrity of the financial markets.
 
This webinar aims to provide investment advisers with a comprehensive understanding of the new SEC cybersecurity requirements introduced in 2023. By attending this session, participants will gain valuable insights into the regulatory landscape and learn how to effectively navigate the evolving cybersecurity landscape to safeguard their clients’ data and reputations. Key topics to be covered during the webinar include:
 
• Overview of the evolving cybersecurity threat landscape in the investment advisory industry
• Detailed examination of the new SEC cybersecurity requirements and their implications for investment advisers
• Understanding the SEC’s expectations for risk assessment, mitigation, and incident response plans
• Exploring best practices for implementing robust cybersecurity policies and procedures
 
About Our Speakers: Karl Bickmore (CEO) and Ted Hulsy (CRO) each have over twenty years of experience of helping businesses raise the bar on cybersecurity and compliance. They will share their first-hand experience with helping financial services clients invest in cybersecurity measures and maintain compliance.
 
If you have additional questions around the new SEC requirements, or would like to discuss the security of your IT environment, please contact us. https://www.snaptechit.com/contact/
 
For more cybersecurity & IT related educational material, please visit our Resources Center. https://www.snaptechit.com/resources/
